    <%
    String id = (String)session.getAttribute("id");
	
    boolean isLogin = false;
    if (null == id) isLogin = false;
    else isLogin = true;
%>

    boardList.js

    function memberCheck(flag)
{
    if (flag)
    {
        location.href = './boardWrite.bo';
    }
    else 
    {
        alert('ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í˜ì´ì§€ë¡œ ì´ë™í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.');
        location.href = './login.me';
    }
}
